# noop

> Function which does [nothing][nop].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var noop = require( '@stdlib/utils/noop' );
```

#### noop()

A `function` which does [nothing][nop].

``` javascript
noop();
// ...does nothing.
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

``` javascript
var noop = require( '@stdlib/utils/noop' );

function foo( next ) {
    // Do something...

    // Then...
    next();
}

foo( noop );
```

<!-- </examples> -->


<section class="links">

[nop]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NOP

<!-- </links> -->
